title: IDragOperator.DragCorrected
description: Gets whether or not the drag operation was corrected.
returns: True if remedial action occurred, false if not
remarks:
If the desired orientation set by
IDragOperator::Drag
or
IDragOperator::IDrag
was not honored and remedial action occurred, then this property is set. This property is not set by
IDragOperator::DragAsUI
.
